feed.title: GitHub Starlark Monthly Trending
feed.subtitle: Monthly Trending of Starlark in GitHub

entry.title: google/bazel-common
entry.summary: Common functionality for Google's open-source libraries that are built with bazel.

entry.title: bazelbuild/rules_foreign_cc
entry.summary: Build rules for interfacing with "foreign" (non-Bazel) build systems (CMake, configure-make, GNU Make, boost, ninja)

entry.title: bazelruby/rules_ruby
entry.summary: Ruby Rules for Bazel. It is, perhaps, production-ready. This project builds atop the work of Yugui, whose original rules can be found at https://github.com/yugui/rules_ruby. Please be aware there is an active fork of this project maintained by Coinbase at https://github.com/coinbase/rules_ruby.
